verses.roman:
eta kahi' sei kare kṛṣṇa-saṅkīrtana
śuni' prakāśānanda kichu kahena vacana

synonyms: eta kahi'—speaking so much; sei—the disciple of Prakāśānanda Sarasvatī; kare—performed; kṛṣṇa-saṅkīrtana—the chanting of the holy name of Kṛṣṇa; śuni'-hearing; prakāśānanda—the guru, Prakāśānanda Sarasvatī; kichu—something; kahena—says; vacana—words.
translation: After saying this, the disciple of Prakāśānanda Sarasvatī began to chant the holy name of Kṛṣṇa. Hearing this, Prakāśānanda Sarasvatī made the following statement.
